subtitle: Our Vision
title:
An Inclusive Community
For All
text: My name is Corey. As a triathlete and a father of a young boy with autism, my passions led to a vision: to create a fun, safe space where athletes of all abilities can compete together. Triathacore was born from that love. We are walkers, runners, cyclists, and swimmers. We are Moms, Dads, and weekend warriors. And most importantly, we are a community with one goal in common: to pay it forward.
